sentences.en: And the website can the normal operation, each page interactive be good.
sentences.cn: 并且网站能够正常运行, 各个页面交互性较好.

sentences.en: As we discussed in the Introduction, interactive digital products are uniquely imbued with complex behavior.
sentences.cn: 而绪论所探讨的交互数字产品比较特殊,其设计充满了复杂的行为.

sentences.en: But with fiber - optic cables, television will become truly interactive.
sentences.cn: 但是,有了光纤电缆, 电视就可以真正成为交互式的.

sentences.en: Do not expect the user to have navigation skills in interactive environment.
sentences.cn: 不要期望使用者在交互的环境中拥有导航的技能.

sentences.en: Image registration source code VC. There are interactive interface. Good use.
sentences.cn: 图像配准VC源代码. 有界面交互. 很好用.

sentences.en: Insist on a language with interactive mode and use it.
sentences.cn: 使用可立即有所回应的程式语言.

sentences.en: interactive teaching methods such as role playing
sentences.cn: 诸如角色扮演等的互动教学法

sentences.en: Interactive telephones Human telephone operators will be sharply replaced by talking computers.
sentences.cn: 交互式电话交互式计算机将很快取代人工电话接线员.

sentences.en: It has provided one kind of ubiquity computing and interactive mode.
sentences.cn: 它提供了一种无处不在的计算和交互方式.

sentences.en: Theaddition of Reuters news service allows interactive reporting , thus improving market liquidity.
sentences.cn: 本公司于公开媒体路透社等,作双向报价创造市场流动性.

sentences.en: This will make computer games more interactive than ever.
sentences.cn: 这会使计算机游戏中人机之间比以前更能互通信息.

sentences.en: Too many interactive products take the attitude: " It isn't my responsibility. "
sentences.cn: 大多软件采取这种态度: “ 这不是我的责任. ”

sentences.en: Why is the technology industry generally so inept at designing the interactive parts of digital products?
sentences.cn: 为什么在技术行业中通常无法设计出好的数字产品的交互部分 呢 ?

sentences.en: Your interactive logon privilege has been disabled. Please contact your administrator.
sentences.cn: 您的交互式登录权限已被禁用.请与您的管理员联系.

sentences.en: Your software should be as interactive and responsive as possible.
sentences.cn: 软件应该具有良好的交互性和反馈性.

sentences.en: Zhongjialin as an agency of Julong IP BOARD interactive whiteboard.
sentences.cn: 北京中加林——巨龙IPBOARD交互式电子白板北京代理.

words.tran_cn: 相互作用；[数] 交互作用

phrases.tran_cn: [计]相互作用式显示器；[计]交互显示

trans.tran_cn: 互相作用的，相互影响的，[计]交互式的，互动的
trans.tran_en: an interactive computer program, television system etc allows you to communicate directly with it, and does things in reaction to your actions
